question: On þissum geare ferde seo (micel) #### scipfierd eft on Englalande ⁠— In this year the great navy went again to England
explanation: Here 'micel' is modifying the singular nominative feminine 'scipfierd' so it takes the feminine 'e' suffix

commonMistakes.explanation: An adjective takes the gender of its noun. As can be seen by 'seo', 'scipfierd' is feminine so 'micel' should take the feminine nominative 'e' suffix
